title: Dodging queue
body:
Hey guys, does anyone know what happens when you dodge a rank queue apart from losing LPs and have to wait a few minutes for another queue?
Do we lose our winrates and/or solo MMR? or anything else?

replies.body: The **only** thing that happens when you dodge a ranked queue is that you loose LP, and are punished with a timer for dodging. No MMR or winrates will be affected.
